column5: Hey everyone,    As some of you may know I am apart of the Barrie Jr. bass masters and this coming Sunday is our first qualifier in Gloucester Pool. We launch out of Port Severn. We are in desperate need of 3 more boats in order run this tournament.  Blast off is at 730 and it ends a 2 pm. I hope we can get enough boats to run this tournament.    Please reply or pm me and I will give you the directors email.    Thanks,    Alex
Bump!  Can anyone help out?  Thanks.
